verses.verse: And when <WH3588> any <WH5315> will offer <WH7126> a meat <WH4503> offering <WH7133> unto the LORD, <WH3068> his offering <WH7133> shall be <WH1961> of fine flour; <WH5560> and he shall pour <WH3332> oil <WH8081> upon <WH5921> it, and put <WH5414> frankincense <WH3828> thereon: <WH5921>

And he shall bring <WH935> it to <WH413> Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> the priests: <WH3548> and he shall take <WH7061> therefrom <WH4480> <WH8033> his handful <WH4393> <WH7062> of the flour <WH4480> <WH5560> thereof, and of the oil <WH4480> <WH8081> thereof, with <WH5921> all <WH3605> the frankincense <WH3828> thereof; and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH853> the memorial <WH234> of it upon the altar, <WH4196> to be an offering made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD: <WH3068>

And the remnant <WH3498> of <WH4480> the meat offering <WH4503> shall be Aaron's <WH175> and his sons': <WH1121> it is a thing most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> of the offerings of the LORD made by fire. <WH4480> <WH801> <WH3068>

And if <WH3588> thou bring <WH7126> an oblation <WH7133> of a meat offering <WH4503> baked <WH3989> in the oven, <WH8574> it shall be unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> or unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> with oil. <WH8081>
And if <WH518> thy oblation <WH7133> be a meat offering <WH4503> baked in <WH5921> a pan, <WH4227> it shall be <WH1961> of fine flour <WH5560> unleavened, <WH4682> mingled <WH1101> with oil. <WH8081>
Thou shalt part <WH6626> it in pieces, <WH6595> and pour <WH3332> oil <WH8081> thereon: <WH5921> it <WH1931> is a meat offering. <WH4503>
And if <WH518> thy oblation <WH7133> be a meat offering <WH4503> baked in the frying pan, <WH4802> it shall be made <WH6213> of fine flour <WH5560> with oil. <WH8081>

And thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH853> the meat offering <WH4503> that <WH834> is made <WH6213> of these things <WH4480> <WH428> unto the LORD: <WH3068> and when it is presented <WH7126> unto <WH413> the priest, <WH3548> he shall bring <WH5066> it unto <WH413> the altar. <WH4196>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH7311> from <WH4480> the meat offering <WH4503> <WH853> a memorial <WH234> thereof, and shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar: <WH4196> it is an offering made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And that which is left <WH3498> of <WH4480> the meat offering <WH4503> shall be Aaron's <WH175> and his sons': <WH1121> it is a thing most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> of the offerings of the LORD made by fire. <WH4480> <WH801> <WH3068>

No <WH3808> <WH3605> meat offering, <WH4503> which <WH834> ye shall bring <WH7126> unto the LORD, <WH3068> shall be made <WH6213> with leaven: <WH2557> for <WH3588> ye shall burn <WH6999> no <WH3808> <WH3605> leaven, <WH7603> nor any <WH3605> honey, <WH1706> in any offering of the LORD made by fire. <WH801> <WH3068>

As for the oblation <WH7133> of the firstfruits, <WH7225> ye shall offer <WH7126> them unto the LORD: <WH3068> but they shall not <WH3808> be burnt <WH5927> on <WH413> the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> savor. <WH7381>

And every <WH3605> oblation <WH7133> of thy meat offering <WH4503> shalt thou season <WH4414> with salt; <WH4417> neither <WH3808> shalt thou suffer the salt <WH4417> of the covenant <WH1285> of thy God <WH430> to be lacking <WH7673> from <WH4480> <WH5921> thy meat offering: <WH4503> with <WH5921> all <WH3605> thine offerings <WH7133> thou shalt offer <WH7126> salt. <WH4417>

And if <WH518> thou offer <WH7126> a meat offering <WH4503> of thy firstfruits <WH1061> unto the LORD, <WH3068> thou shalt offer <WH7126> <WH853> for the meat offering <WH4503> of thy firstfruits <WH1061> green ears of corn <WH24> dried <WH7033> by the fire, <WH784> even corn beaten <WH1643> out of full ears. <WH3759>
And thou shalt put <WH5414> oil <WH8081> upon <WH5921> it, and lay <WH7760> frankincense <WH3828> thereon: <WH5921> it <WH1931> is a meat offering. <WH4503>

And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> <WH853> the memorial <WH234> of it, part of the beaten corn <WH4480> <WH1643> thereof, and part of the oil <WH4480> <WH8081> thereof, with <WH5921> all <WH3605> the frankincense <WH3828> thereof: it is an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
